ch.cern.dbod.ui.model

Class CommandStatsModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zkoss.zul.AbstractListModel
      • ch.cern.dbod.ui.model.CommandStatsModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.zkoss.zul.ext.Selectable, org.zkoss.zul.ext.Sortable, org.zkoss.zul.ListModel

    public class CommandStatsModel
extends org.zkoss.zul.AbstractListModel
implements org.zkoss.zul.ext.Sortable
    Represents a list of command stats. It implements sorting to save it from query to query.
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
